alert.note: Alert for Clay; East Otter Tail; West Becker; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Clay, northwestern Otter Tail and southwestern Becker Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hawley, or 21 miles west of Detroit Lakes, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Perham, Lake Lida, Star Lake, Big McDonald Lake, Vergas, Dent and Shoreham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; East Otter Tail; West Becker; West Otter Tail
